column1: Little Goat Diner////What is there to say that hasn't already been said in the 2K yelp reviews? Aside from the amazing food
column2: the service was also outstanding! Our server took the time to chat with us about the menu and our trip to Chicago. We ordered the crab dip
column4: and the corn beef hash. Granted we came from brunch on a Sunday so it is expected for the kitchen to be backed up. We finished both the crab dip and the shrimp & grits and waited a good 10 minutes before the corn beef hash came. It was definitely worth the wait!
